events.name: Activate
events.description: When the form becomes the active window.

events.name: Click
events.description: When the user clicks the form.

events.name: DblClick
events.description: When the user double-clicks the form.

events.name: Deactivate
events.description: When the form loses the focus and is no longer the active window.

events.name: KeyDown
events.description: When a key is pressed while the form has the focus.

events.name: KeyPress
events.description: When a key is pressed and released while the form has the focus.

events.name: KeyUp
events.description: When a key is released while the form has the focus.

events.name: Load
events.description: When the form is loaded into memory.

events.name: MouseDown
events.description: When the user presses a mouse button while the pointer is over the form.

events.name: MouseMove
events.description: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the form.

events.name: MouseUp
events.description: When the user releases a mouse button that was pressed while the pointer was over the form.

events.name: Resize
events.description: When the size of the form changes.

events.name: Unload
events.description: When the form is unloaded from memory.
